The U: S. Department of Agriculture and other federal and local agencies hosted an event called The Iowa LGBT Rural Summit, which aimed to share information on policies, programs, and services for LGBT rural communities.
Drake University: along with organizations like One Iowa, the National Center for Lesbian Rights, and True Colors Fund, partnered with the U.S. Department of Agriculture to organize the Iowa LGBT Rural Summit, highlighting the unique needs of the LGBT community in rural areas.
Conservative commentators: including right-wing blogs and radio talk show host Rush Limbaugh, distorted the purpose of the event, claiming that it was about teaching lesbian farmers how to obtain government subsidies like rural housing loans and community facility grants.
Limbaugh specifically accused President: attack" conservative rural areas, suggesting that federal money was being used to entice lesbians to become farmers in order to infiltrate and undermine conservative strongholds.
